mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pay (pay_code, payment_method, payment_history, amount, paid_at, stock_id) VALUES (#{paycode}, #{paymentmethod}, #{paymenthistory}, #{amount}, #{paidat}, #{stockId})
mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.pay_code AS paycode, p.payment_method AS paymentmethod, p.payment_history AS paymenthistory, p.amount, p.paid_at AS paidat, s.office_id AS officeId, s.menu_id AS menuId, o.office_name AS storeLocation FROM pay p JOIN stock s ON p.stock_id = s.id JOIN office o ON s.office_id = o.id ORDER BY p.paid_at
